snippet.title: Horizon Of Horus | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
VR Tower Defense game "Horizon of Horus" is now on Steam! 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2715790/Horizon_of_Horus/ 

Follow us: 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gfds_inc/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/gfds_tr 

Join Our Discord Channel: 
https://discord.gg/865rSuAn

Visit Horizon of Horus website: 
https://horizonofhorus.com/ 

Embark on a thrilling journey through the mesmerizing landscapes of Ancient Egypt in "Horizon of Horus" – a Virtual Reality action-tower defense game. Immerse yourself in a world of magic and mythology, where you are the last line of defense against mythological creatures.

#strategy #towerdefense #vr #vrgames #games #steam #steamgame
